SEARCH
Package game

Class User

java.lang.Object
game.Participant
game.User
All Implemented Interfaces:
Decision, UserRecognition, Serializable
public class User extends Participant implements Decision, Serializable
User is class which inherits from abstract class Participant, also implements Decision, Serializable interfaces Stores and manages user's data with methods like setPassword, giveVote, voteFor. Also contains foundations for serialisation which might be implemented later.
Since:
1.3.2024
Version:
Final
Author:
Å imon Vinkler
